doc.title: Willkommen_Witamy
doc.plot: This documentary is the result of one year shooting in the European city Görlitz-Zgorzelec. Since World War 2 the city is divided in two parts: West of the river Neiße came to Germany, east of to Poland. This is not one of those nice designed image movies normally being used for tourist business to demonstrate an inner European harmony - which maybe does not exist in real life. Here the streets are not brushed, the normal citizens are not out-of-focus the cameras, and no actors from outer cities came to make a pseudo documentary! 'Willkommen Witamy' is a fascinating documentary, providing the real life here in the hearth of Europa, still being divided by the Schengen border, but most fascinating, charming and worth living.
